name: Open Library API
description: Open, editable library catalog with data on millions of books ever published

name: Google Books API
description: Search and retrieve book information, metadata, and previews from Google's vast book index

name: NASA API
description: Access NASA data including Astronomy Picture of the Day, Mars rover photos, and satellite imagery

name: Crossref API
description: Searchable access to millions of scholarly article bibliographic metadata and citation data

name: Semantic Scholar API
description: AI-powered research tool providing access to over 200 million academic papers with citations

name: Unpaywall API
description: Find free legal full-text versions of research articles via DOI lookup

name: arXiv API
description: Access Cornell's open-access repository of scientific e-prints in physics, math, CS, and more

name: Project Gutenberg API
description: Access over 70,000 free eBooks from the public domain literary archive

name: Wikidata API
description: Free knowledge base with structured data for millions of entities used across Wikimedia projects

name: DBpedia API
description: Structured information extracted from Wikipedia available as linked open data

name: OpenAlex API
description: Open catalog of the global research system with papers, authors, institutions, and concepts

name: CORE API
description: Access millions of open access research papers from repositories and journals worldwide

name: Library of Congress API
description: Access digital collections, bibliographic data, and resources from the US Library of Congress

name: Internet Archive API
description: Access millions of free books, movies, software, music, and websites from the Wayback Machine

name: Astronomy API
description: Astronomical data including planet positions, star charts, and moon phases for any date and location

name: Open Astronomy Catalog API
description: Access data on supernovae, tidal disruption events, and other astronomical transients

name: NASA ADS API
description: SAO/NASA Astrophysics Data System digital library for astronomy and physics research

name: SHARE API
description: Open dataset about research and scholarly activities aggregated from many sources

name: OpenStax API
description: Free, peer-reviewed openly licensed textbooks for college and high school courses

name: Europeana API
description: Search millions of items from European museums, galleries, libraries, and archives

name: Art Institute of Chicago API
description: Access artwork data, images, and exhibition information from the Art Institute of Chicago

name: Metropolitan Museum of Art API
description: Access artwork data and images from The Met's collection of over 470,000 artworks

name: Rijksmuseum API
description: Access the collection data and images of the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam

name: Harvard Art Museums API
description: Access the Harvard Art Museums collections including over 250,000 objects

name: Cooper Hewitt API
description: Access the Smithsonian Design Museum collection data and metadata

name: PubChem API
description: Access chemical information including compound structures, properties, and bioactivities

name: PubMed API (E-utilities)
description: Access biomedical literature citations and abstracts from MEDLINE and life science journals

name: Open Notify ISS API
description: Current location of the International Space Station and number of people in space

name: Sunrise Sunset API
description: Get sunrise and sunset times for any location based on latitude and longitude

name: Open Food Facts API
description: Collaborative database of food products with ingredients, nutrition facts, and more

name: GBIF API
description: Global Biodiversity Information Facility with data on all types of life on Earth

name: iNaturalist API
description: Access biodiversity observations, species data, and identification from citizen scientists

name: USGS Earthquake API
description: Real-time and historical earthquake data from the US Geological Survey

name: WorldBank API
description: Access global development data including indicators for countries and regions worldwide

name: REST Countries API
description: Get information about countries including population, languages, currencies, and flags

name: GeoNames API
description: Geographical database with over 25 million place names and geographic information

name: Open Trivia API (Quizlord)
description: Generate trivia questions by category and difficulty via a community-contributed database

name: jService API
description: Trivia questions from the Jeopardy! game show database with over 200,000 clues

name: Spaceflight News API
description: Access space-related news articles, blogs, and reports from various sources

name: SpaceX API
description: Open source REST API for SpaceX launch, rocket, capsule, and pad data

name: Launch Library 2 API
description: Comprehensive database of past and upcoming space launches worldwide

name: ORCID API
description: Access researcher identity data linking researchers to their scholarly contributions

name: OpenCitations API
description: Open citation data providing bibliographic and citation information for scholarly works

name: Smithsonian Open Access API
description: Access digital assets from the Smithsonian Institution's collections across all museums

name: Digital Public Library of America API
description: Access millions of items from America's libraries, archives, and museums

name: HathiTrust Bibliographic API
description: Access bibliographic data from HathiTrust's collection of millions of digitized volumes

name: ISBNDB API
description: Database of books with ISBNs, providing title, author, publisher, and subject data

name: WorldCat Search API
description: Search OCLC's WorldCat database of library holdings from thousands of libraries

name: Springer Nature API
description: Access metadata for millions of articles, books, and journals from Springer Nature

name: DOAJ API
description: Directory of Open Access Journals providing metadata for thousands of open access journals

name: xeno-canto API
description: Shared bird sounds from around the world with species, location, and recordist data

name: Trefle API
description: Botanical data API with information on plant species, distributions, and taxonomy

name: IUCN Red List API
description: Access conservation status data for animal and plant species worldwide

name: OpenAI Evals API
description: Public dataset of evaluation questions and answers for testing AI education models

name: PoetryDB API
description: Free API for accessing classic poetry by author, title, lines, and linecount

name: Frankfurter Exchange Rates
description: Free currency exchange rate API with historical data from the European Central Bank

name: NASA EONET API
description: Earth Observatory Natural Event Tracker providing real-time natural events data

name: NASA APOD API
description: Astronomy Picture of the Day with explanation by a professional astronomer

name: Newton Math API
description: Perform mathematical operations including simplify, factor, derive, integrate, and more

name: Deck of Cards API
description: Simulate a deck of cards for educational probability and statistics demonstrations
